                      <div class="interests-statement">
                      什么值得买是一家中立的消费门户网站，好价信息来自热心值友爆料和商家自荐，经小编人工审核或小值机器人智能判断后发布。促销折扣可能随时变化，请值友们购买前注意核实。
                  </div>
                            <!-- 价格说明 -->
      <div class="price-tag-info">好价信息中“价格标签”及“比价结果”均为系统自动计算生成，详情请查看<a target="_blank" href="https://res.smzdm.com/rule/wap/index.html?banner_key=biaoqian">功能说明</a>。</div>

    <div class="report_title">我要举报：</div>
    <ul class="error_report">
        <li class="li other goods" id="haojia_error" data-name="好价失效">
            好价失效
            <div class="other_report_box goods_report_box">
                请选择举报理由：
                <ul class="report_reason report_reason1">
                    <li>
                        <input type="radio" id="haojia_error_one" data-type="1" name="haojia_error" class="rd">
                        <label for="haojia_error_one"></label>
                        <label for="haojia_error_one" class="">无货或下架</label>
                    </li>

                    <li>
                        <input type="radio" id="haojia_error_two" data-type="2" name="haojia_error" class="rd">
                        <label for="haojia_error_two"></label>
                        <label for="haojia_error_two" class="">已涨价</label>
                    </li>

                    <li>
                        <input type="radio" id="haojia_error_three" data-type="17" name="haojia_error" class="rd">
                        <label for="haojia_error_three"></label>
                        <label for="haojia_error_three" class="">优惠券或促销活动失效</label>
                    </li>
                </ul>
                <button>确认提交</button>
            </div>
        </li>

        <li class="li other goods" id="haojia_error1" data-name="内容问题">
            内容问题
            <div class="other_report_box goods_report_box">
                请选择举报理由：

      <!--打分模块-   id 是  rating_  +  文章id  -->

            <a class="quan-avaliable-subtitle" href="https://www.smzdm.com/p/141831675/" target="_blank" onclick="sensors.track('DetailModelClick', {'business':'好价','model_name':'相关推荐','article_id':'97845864','article_title':'支付宝 积分兑换 兑1元通用红包','sub_article_id':'141831675','sub_article_title':'淘宝 淘出666 可领随机无门槛红包','channel':'youhui','channel_id':'1','sub_channel':'youhui','sub_channel_id':'1'})">实测0.66元无门槛红包</a>
        </div>
            </div>
</div>

                                    <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-info-zan" id="cdc_support_286331783" data-item="3, 1, 286331783, 97845864, 286331783">

                                </div>
                            </div>

                    <div class="comment-main-list-item-content">

                            <!-- 昵称区域 -->
                            <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-header">
                                <div>
                                    <!-- 用户昵称 -->

                                        <a href="https://zhiyou.smzdm.com/member/9816374258/pinglun" target="_blank">买买提提一斤</a>
